meanings: (교체·교환하다) change (sth for sth); (맞바꾸다) exchange (sth for sth), trade[swap] (sth for sth); (오래된 것을) replace (sth with...

vlive.korean: 네 한번 바꿔 주실래요? Can you change the filter, please? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 산랔 아점 냠냠😋
vlive.english: Can you change the filter, please?

vlive.korean: 어떨 때 바꿔? When do you replace it? 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE TV “MORE & MORE” Comeback Week #2
그러면 어떻게 ASMR로 한번 바꿔볼까? Okay, let me change to ASMR then. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [BTS] 번쩍이는 슥찌 미모에 눈 앞이 뽀샤시한 사람의 모임 (1/nn..)✨ (JIN talking about his childhood episode)
vlive.english: Okay, let me change to ASMR then.

vlive.korean: 어떻게 필터를 좀 바꿔볼까? 저 필터를 바꿀 수가 있나 지금? Can we change the filter? Can I adjust it? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 정한의 따뜻한 우유한잔(보이는 라디오)
vlive.english: Can we change the filter? Can I adjust it?

vlive.korean: [나도 의상 바꾸게 해주라] 나도 커스텀 하고 싶은데 어떻게 바꿔? [Let me change the outfit, too] I want to customize the outfit. How can I do it? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.108
vlive.english: [Let me change the outfit, too] I want to customize the outfit. How can I do it?

examples.korean: He transforms the most ordinary subject into the sublime. 발음듣기 그는 지극히 평범한 소재를 절묘한 것으로 바꿔 놓는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He transforms the most ordinary subject into the sublime. 발음

examples.korean: to cash a cheque 발음듣기 수표를 현금으로 바꾸다[바꿔 주다] Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
Where do I have to change? 발음듣기 제가 어디서 바꿔 타야 해요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Where do I have to change? 발음

examples.korean: Do you have change for five dollars? 발음듣기 5달러 바꿔 주실 수 있어요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Do you have change for five dollars? 발음

examples.korean: an event that changed the course of history 발음듣기 역사의 추이를 바꿔 놓은 사건 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: an event that changed the course of history 발음
